headline.main: WEYGAND AIDE JOINS FORCES OF DE GAULLE; General Odic Acts Here After Removal of Commander

lead_paragraph: As a result of General Weygand's recent removal from, command by the Vichy government, General Robert Odic, one of General Weygand's high-ranking staff officers now in this country on a mission, has broken with Vichy and joined the de Gaulle "Free French" movement, the Free French delegation in the United States disclosed here yesterday.
abstract: Gen R Odic, on mission in U S, breaks with Vichy Govt; statement quoted
